u.a: ava climbs immediately onto car and begins to turn wheel . looks around the room and announces this . she gets off car , picks up telephone and climbs back on car .
SAM runs dunebugqy along floor near car , making appropriate motor noises .
ava climbs off car and walks over to oven , while announcing a possible plan .
SAM leaves dune buggy and comes over to oven and begins to speak .
but he is interrupted by this emphaticly , as ava waves him away from oven .
SAM quietly asks this while gazing at poster above oven .
ava answers quietly , with direct gaze .
SAM asks if he can help , with direct gaze .
ava refuses him and attempts to find something to occupy him while she is in "kitchen" . she points at poster , SAM follows point .
with no reaction from SAM , she says this with emphasis .
she orders this , looking toward couch .
SAM refuses pretend role emphatically , with direct gaze , shaking his head .
ava asks this while turning knobs on
SAM answers this in high voice and shrug of shoulders .
ava asks this still watching oven
SAM answers this with direct gaze .
ava decides on another plan , and climbs on car , leaving SAM to the oven .
asking for an agreement .
SAM accepts new role , apparently pleased that the oven is his . this is said smiling , with direct gaze to ava on car .
ava agrees
ava turns wheel and "drives" while SAM watches with interest and then turns to oven .

SAM hears that and interprets it as valid warning and gets up with this and takes magnifying glass away from front of car and returns to oven . ava continues to "drive" after watching him rescue magnifying glass .

when SAM returns to oven , some pot or pan falls off oven and SAM says this to self , and attracts ava's attention . SAM picks up broom and sweeps behind car , ava watches for moment and then gazes around room with back to SAM .
ava returns to "driving" . SAM again interprets "watch out" as warning to something in front of car and walks around to front of car and looks for something to remove .
ava asks this with direct gaze .
SAM mutters this in mimic under breath .

what the girl appears to be doing in poster .
ava again becomes bored with what she's doing , climbs off car , and moves off camera .

SAM assuming ava's role and assigning her to his former role and begins to turn steering wheel .
ava commands this in high voice .
SAM asks this still turning wheel .
is interrupted by ava's question .
SAM excitedly "drives" , ava comes over to car and picks up broom and sweeps around car , watching SAM with interest .
ava suggests this to SAM to make his driving more enjoyable .
SAM takes her suggestion .
SAM continues turning steering wheel while ava holds up something , off camera , and asks this .
SAM turns around on car and answers with shout this , which was hard to understand .
ava requests clarification here with rising intonation .
she gets no answer rephrases her question .
SAM , standing on car , turrs back to ava , and answers while turning wheel .
ava obviously not ready to give up sam's attention , persists with another question
this elicits an answer , and then direct gaze from SAM , who , still standing , turns and halfsits on wheel .
ava continues with questioning , as she walks to cradle .
SAM watches and answers , and spies baby in cradle
SAM quickly corrects himself in louder voice .
ava picks up doll and hugs and cuddles it and gently sings to it . SAM climbs off car and watches and reaches out to touch doll in ava's arm , obviously very interested .
SAM then takes a look in cradle and finds animal puppet and calls it and puts it on hand .
ava puts bottle in baby's mouth and continues to speak to it in soft lilting voice .
ava takes it over to sofa and stands on sofa .
SAM comes over to sofa and has puppet ask this in strange loud voice .
ava pauses for a moment and chooses not to pursue sam's pretend play and sits down on sofa and continues singing to the baby here , completely ignoring SAM .

SAM watches , takes off puppet , and then reaches into sofa for the baby's bottle and ava quickly reprimands at first in strong voice and then in softer voice as she realizes she is talking in front of the baby .
ava takes doll's hat off and asks this of SAM .
SAM answers with much interest , watching every move , leaning against edge of sofa .
ava comments .
ava asks with emphasis on "now" . SAM answers this just to be helpful .
ava does not want this answer , and repeats her question rephrased negatively .
and elicits correct answer this time .
ava adjusts hat and asks again .
eliciting response from SAM .
ava adjusts hat again and asks .
elicits another immediate response from SAM . both children seem to be smiling throughout the routine .
ava addresses first part of this to doll and looks up at SAM and asks , "right ?" .

ava repeats question assigning him new role
SAM accepts and answers .
ava seems to be testing his acceptance of roles when she comments , but SAM responds negatively and designates what it is he associates a girl with a baby as doing
requests confirmation .
with direct gaze , ava begins identifying herself .
ava is not satisfied with that one and rephrases .
rephrases .
rephrases , this time looking down at doll as SAM walks away . ava still wants to play and calls him back with a name she knows he will answer to "hey , dad ."
SAM answers with direct gaze .
and ava responds , as she gets off sofa and climbs onto car .
SAM gives his permission
a second time with more emphasis and follows her to car after putting down stuffed tiger he had picked up a minute ago .
ava adds this

SAM walks to oven and busies himself with pots and pans while ava actively "drives ." SAM gives permission after watching to see that baby is put safely aside
ava actively "drives ."

SAM again hears "get out of the way'' and gets up to see what is obstructing the car , tripping and falling on the way and kicks a telephone away from the front of the car while ava pauses and watches .
after having done his duty , SAM returns to oven and ava continuos driving and adding sound effects .
but stops turning wheel and slides off side starting to announce her arrival
ava answers with direct gaze and puts doll behind her and again but SAM interrupts in very loud voice .

apparently independent play with attempts at interaction and very loose role play . makes more sound effects .
SAM moves toward car , with hand on wheel , turns to ava and asks but gets no response .

ava's "announcer like" tone , almost sung . SAM follows obediently , ava repeats loudly , and carries pot and spoon to car .

takes stern father role , and tries to push her off car .
she holds on tighter and with direct gaze , says this .
SAM stops pushing
comments and walks away from car dejectedly to sofa .
ava continues driving .
turns to SAM with direct gaze as he pulls snakc off sofa with back to ava .
said in "scary" voice .
ava asks this
SAM answers with direct gaze , showing her the snake .
ava asks this and SAM makes sound effects
he moves snake to touch ava .
ava backs away almost falling off car and climbs off continuing to watch SAM and snake , her back to camera .
SAM says in scary voice and throws snake back onto sofa and returns to car while ava observes .
SAM claims car and climbs on .
ava runs to cradle , in whining voice
takes doll out of crib , hugging it , takes it to sofa .
SAM observes with interest and finally turns to car and drives , makes sound effects , hears ava's baby noises and turns to her and asks .
ava ignores and in "breathy" voice . being ignored , SAM turns to wheel and drives .
ava interrupts screeching tire noise and speaks to doll .
SAM turns to her and seconds her command while climbing off car .
ava requests aid in disciplining doll
SAM quickly complies , walking to sofa .
ava playfully pretends he commanded her and asks for reason to go to sleep .

ava persists in her play .

hits ava twice and walks to oven , aggressively slams door , knocks plates and pan off car .
ava obviously enjoying this pretend scene invites more discipline , SAM complies and hits her several times .

ava asks quietly .

SAM shouts statements while swinging teddy bear around .
SAM throws bear on ava , who is half way on sofa . SAM steps on bear and sits on it and ava wanders over to car and climbs on .
SAM follows her with gaze and mutters to himself .
ava loudly calls and SAM loudly
immediately answers .
ava begins with request and finishes with loud command to SAM to repeat her pretend command , patting seat behind her to show him where to sit .
SAM walks over , shouts , patting seat where ava had .
ava adds this and goes back to allow SAM to sit in driver's seat .
SAM misunderstands her allowance to let him drive and attempts to confirm who is to drive , turning wheel and making sound effects .
at SAM gets off car having arrived at destination
picks up dune buggy and puts it on car .
ava inspects dune buggy and asks about object inside .
SAM volunteers his services and attempts to get on car
specifies when he will work on dune buggy always asking for an "okay ."
ava mutters this under her breath as she fiddles with dune buggy and SAM watches , twisted in car seat .
SAM situates himself in seat and proceeds to drive , commanding ava to move her dune buggy back to give him more room . ava sits quietly on back , still holding dune buggy between them on seat .
